qas.question: What Speedway in North Carolina hosts two Sprint cupseries races each year?
Where is Charlotte motor Speedway located?
What North Carolina city hosts the NASCAR Hall of Fame?
What North carolina city is home to several top racing teams?

context: In addition to professional team sports, North Carolina has a strong affiliation with NASCAR and stock-car racing, with <a0_0>Charlotte Motor Speedway<a0_0/> in <a1_0>Concord<a1_0/> hosting two Sprint Cup Series races every year. <a2_0>Charlotte<a2_0/> also hosts the NASCAR Hall of Fame, while <a3_0>Concord<a3_0/> is the home of several top-flight racing teams, including Hendrick Motorsports, Roush Fenway Racing, Richard Petty Motorsports, Stewart-Haas Racing, and Chip Ganassi Racing. Numerous other tracks around North Carolina host races from low-tier NASCAR circuits as well.
